Room.Name: Keslar's Den
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a den containing a desk and a single bookshelf.
Room.LongDescription: The Keslar den is used as a small meeting place where people can meet in privacy to conduct business. There's a large desk in the exact center of the room and a table with a flask of brandy. The books on the bookshelf appear to be just old ledgers showing the financial stability of the family.
